meanings.definition: To cover or surround with a layer of something
meanings.sent1: She bepelted the cake with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: The car was bepelted with snow during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy bepelted the yard with muddy paw prints.
meanings.sent4: The artist bepelted the canvas with vibrant strokes of paint.
meanings.sent5: The garden was bepelted with a blanket of fragrant flowers.
